name: The Oregon Trail (2022)
description: The Oregon Trail is a re-release of the original game, released on Apple Arcade in 2021, with new quests, additional events, modern lighting, and visual effects. The game is something of a mix of a quest, adventure and arcade. The name of the game is related to the Oregon Trail that really existed in the 19th century. The player chooses a profession: a banker from Boston a carpenter from Ohio or a farmer from Illinois, names the squad members and purchases supplies. You will once again have to go an exciting journey where you will have to make difficult choices, face new dangers and unpredictable situations. Load the wagon with supplies, choose a group for the journey, and make sure everyone makes it safely to Oregon by making difficult decisions in dangerous and unexpected situations. Learn the true history of the nations, including the experiences of the Native Americans, first introduced in the game.
